title: [Neuroscience] Researchers can predict what syllables a bird will sing—and when it will sing them—by reading electrical signals in its brain. Having the ability to predict a bird’s vocal behavior from its brain activity is an early step toward building vocal prostheses for humans who have lost the ability to speak
[Health] Fluoride regulates chondrocyte proliferation and autophagy via PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling pathway (Nov 2021)
